name: Give Me Five!
description:
Made for the 2019 Yogscast Game Jam with the theme of 'Giving'.

Give crisp high-fives to rack up a high score!

Instructions:
wasd to control the left hand.
Arrow keys to control the right hand.

The better you line up the hands the bigger you will score. Hit multiple in a row without missing to build up your combo multiplier for that hand.

Screenshot and post your high score in comments and we will add it to the leader board!
